QuestData.Title: A Grandmother's Remedy
QuestData.Description: Oh my, such a vigorous young $Glad:lass;! Such a spring in your step, and such a sparkle in your eye!$B$BWhen you get to my age, it's all aches and pains.$B$BLuckily, I have a recipe for an unguent that would soothe my joints. I just need the ooze from the skin of belly toads in the swamp.$B$BWould you be a dear and help an old woman out?
QuestData.CompletionText: It's all downhill from here, dearie.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh thank you child, thank you, thank you.$B$BThe nights in the swamp are cold. It means a lot to this old woman to have some comfort from her aching bones.
